thread.title: Copperfield forced to reveal magic trick in court

title: Copperfield forced to reveal magic trick in court
text:
Copperfield forced to reveal magic trick in court 10:54am BST - 01:48 
Magician David Copperfield was forced to reveal the secrets behind a vanishing act in court after a British man claimed he was injured during Copperfield's ''Lucky #13'' trick in November 2013 in Las Vegas. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Magician David Copperfield was forced to reveal the secrets behind a vanishing act in court after a British man claimed he was injured during Copperfield's "Lucky #13" trick in November 2013 in Las Vegas.
